trans-unit.source: Implements a markup extension that describes the location of the binding source relative to the position of the binding target.
trans-unit.target: 實作標記延伸，這個標記延伸描述與繫結目標位置相對的繫結來源位置。

trans-unit.source: One of the ways to specify a binding source is to use the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.RelativeSource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個指定的繫結來源的方式是使用<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.RelativeSource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This is the property type of that property.
trans-unit.target: 這是該屬性的屬性類型。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource> is simultaneously a markup extension implementation and a data object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource> 同時是標記延伸實作和資料物件。

trans-unit.source: When the extension returns itself (see <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.ProvideValue%2A>), the relevant information is contained in the data.
trans-unit.target: 當延伸模組會傳回本身 (請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.ProvideValue%2A>)，資料中包含的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: The main purpose of the markup extension is to allow a variable-argument constructor syntax in attribute form, so that the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.FindAncestor> mode can be defined inline with the two extra arguments for ancestor type and level that the other modes do not require.
trans-unit.target: 標記延伸的主要用途是允許以屬性形式的變數引數建構函式語法以便<xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.FindAncestor>模式可以是內部定義的兩個額外的引數的上階類型和其他模式不需要的層級。

trans-unit.source: For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/relativesource-markupextension.md).
trans-unit.target: 如[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]的詳細資訊，請參閱[RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/relativesource-markupextension.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a style trigger that creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> that reports a validation error message.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範建立樣式觸發程序<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>，報告驗證錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.RelativeSource%2A> property, the value of the setter binds to the error content of the current <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> (the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> using the style).
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.RelativeSource%2A>屬性 setter 的值繫結至目前的錯誤內容<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>(<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>使用樣式)。

trans-unit.source: For more information on this example, see [How to: Implement Binding Validation](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-binding-validation.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關此範例的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 實作繫結驗證](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-binding-validation.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the <xref:System.Windows.Style> definition of a custom control called `NumericUpDown`.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例所示<xref:System.Windows.Style>定義的自訂控制項稱為`NumericUpDown`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock.Text%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> is bound to the `Value` of the object that is the `TemplatedParent`, which is the `NumericUpDown` control that this <xref:System.Windows.Style> is applied to in this case.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock.Text%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>繫結至`Value`相關物件`TemplatedParent`，也就是`NumericUpDown`控制這個<xref:System.Windows.Style>在此情況下套用至。

trans-unit.source: For the complete sample, see [NumericUpDown Custom Control with Theme and UI Automation Support Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160025).
trans-unit.target: 如需完整範例，請參閱[NumericUpDown 自訂控制項搭配主題和 UI 自動化支援範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160025)。

trans-unit.source: The following returns the second <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> encountered on the upward path starting at the target element of the binding.
trans-unit.target: 下列傳回第二個<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>向上路徑開始繫結的目標項目上發生。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource" /> class with an initial mode.
trans-unit.target: 以初始模式來初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: For this signature to be relevant, this should be <see cref="F:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.FindAncestor" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個簽章若要相關，這就應該是 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.FindAncestor" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of ancestor to look for.
trans-unit.target: 要尋找的祖系 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The ordinal position of the desired ancestor among all ancestors of the given type.
trans-unit.target: 在所有屬於特定型別祖系當中，所需祖系的序數位置。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource" /> class with an initial mode and additional tree-walking qualifiers for finding the desired relative source.
trans-unit.target: 以初始模式加上尋找所需相對來源的額外樹狀目錄結構導覽限定詞，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: `ancestorType` and `ancestorLevel` have no relevance if given as parameters for a `mode` other than <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.FindAncestor>.
trans-unit.target: `ancestorType` 和`ancestorLevel`具有不相關，如果做為參數指定`mode`以外<xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.FindAncestor>。

trans-unit.source: Do not use this signature for the other <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode> values.
trans-unit.target: 請勿使用此簽章其他<xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode>值。

trans-unit.source: The following returns the second <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> encountered on the upward path starting at the target element of the binding.
trans-unit.target: 下列傳回第二個<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>向上路徑開始繫結的目標項目上發生。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the level of ancestor to look for, in <see cref="F:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.FindAncestor" /> mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要尋找的祖系層級，採用 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.FindAncestor" /> 模式。

trans-unit.source: Use 1 to indicate the one nearest to the binding target element.
trans-unit.target: 使用 1 來表示最接近繫結目標項目的項目。

trans-unit.source: The ancestor level.
trans-unit.target: 上階層級。

trans-unit.source: Use 1 to indicate the one nearest to the binding target element.
trans-unit.target: 使用 1 來表示最接近繫結目標項目的項目。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.Mode%2A> property is not set explicitly, setting the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorType%2A> or the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorLevel%2A> property will implicitly lock the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.Mode%2A> property value to <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.FindAncestor>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.Mode%2A>屬性未設定明確地設定<xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorType%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorLevel%2A>屬性會以隱含方式鎖定<xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.Mode%2A>屬性值設定為<xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.FindAncestor>。

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 文字用法

trans-unit.source: For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/relativesource-markupextension.md).
trans-unit.target: 如[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]的詳細資訊，請參閱[RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/relativesource-markupextension.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following returns the second <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> encountered on the upward path starting at the target element of the binding.
trans-unit.target: 下列傳回第二個<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>向上路徑開始繫結的目標項目上發生。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of ancestor to look for.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要尋找的祖系型別。

trans-unit.source: The type of ancestor.
trans-unit.target: 祖系的型別。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.Mode%2A> property is not set explicitly, setting the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorType%2A> or the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorLevel%2A> property will implicitly lock the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.Mode%2A> property value to <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.FindAncestor>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.Mode%2A>屬性未設定明確地設定<xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorType%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorLevel%2A>屬性會以隱含方式鎖定<xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.Mode%2A>屬性值設定為<xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.FindAncestor>。

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 文字用法

trans-unit.source: For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/relativesource-markupextension.md).
trans-unit.target: 如[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]的詳細資訊，請參閱[RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/relativesource-markupextension.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following returns the second <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> encountered on the upward path starting at the target element of the binding.
trans-unit.target: 下列傳回第二個<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>向上路徑開始繫結的目標項目上發生。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource" /> is not in the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.FindAncestor" /> mode.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource" /> 不是處於 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.FindAncestor" /> 模式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode" /> value that describes the location of the binding source relative to the position of the binding target.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode" /> 值，這個值描述與繫結目標位置相對的繫結來源位置。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only after initialization.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀，在初始化之後。

trans-unit.source: If this property is not set explicitly, setting the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorType%2A> or the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorType%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorLevel%2A> properties will implicitly lock this property value to <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.FindAncestor>.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性未明確設定，設定<xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorType%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorType%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorLevel%2A>屬性會以隱含方式鎖定此屬性值設<xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.FindAncestor>。

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 文字用法

trans-unit.source: For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/relativesource-markupextension.md).
trans-unit.target: 如[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]的詳細資訊，請參閱[RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/relativesource-markupextension.md)。

trans-unit.source: This property is immutable after initialization.
trans-unit.target: 初始化之後，這個屬性就是固定的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Instead of changing the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.Mode" /> on this instance, create a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource" /> or use a different static instance.
trans-unit.target: 不要變更這個執行個體上的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.Mode" />，而要建立新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource" /> 或使用不同的靜態執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets a static value that is used to return a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource" /> constructed for the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.PreviousData" /> mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得靜態值，作用是傳回針對 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource" /> 模式建構的 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.PreviousData" />。

trans-unit.source: A static <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource" />.
trans-unit.target: 靜態 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource" />。

trans-unit.source: Three of the four <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode> values, <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.PreviousData>, <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.Self>, or <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.TemplatedParent>, can produce a <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource> that is wholly static, containing no unique private values.
trans-unit.target: 四個中的三種<xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode>值<xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.PreviousData>， <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.Self>，或<xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.TemplatedParent>，可能會產生<xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource>，是全部靜態的其中包含沒有唯一的私用值。

trans-unit.source: All uses of the static property can share the same object, eliminating the need to allocate separate objects for each use.
trans-unit.target: 使用靜態屬性的所有可共用相同的物件，因而不須每次使用配置個別物件。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, using the static property reduces memory usage.
trans-unit.target: 因此，使用靜態屬性，可降低記憶體使用量。

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 文字用法

trans-unit.source: For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/relativesource-markupextension.md).
trans-unit.target: 如[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]的詳細資訊，請參閱[RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/relativesource-markupextension.md)。

trans-unit.source: An object that can provide services for the markup extension.
trans-unit.target: 可以為標記延伸提供服務的物件。

trans-unit.source: In this implementation, this parameter can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 在這個實作中，此參數可以是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns an object that should be set as the value on the target object's property for this markup extension.
trans-unit.target: 傳回物件，此物件應該設定為目標物件對於這個標記延伸之屬性上的值。

trans-unit.source: For <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource" />, this is another <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource" />, using the appropriate source for the specified mode.
trans-unit.target: 對於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource" />，這是另一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource" />，使用指定之模式的適當來源。

trans-unit.source: Another <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource" />.
trans-unit.target: 另一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource> is simultaneously a markup extension implementation and a data object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource> 同時是標記延伸實作和資料物件。

trans-unit.source: When the extension returns itself, the relevant information is contained in the data.
trans-unit.target: 延伸模組會傳回本身的資料中包含的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: The main purpose of the markup extension is to allow a variable-argument constructor syntax in attribute form so that the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.FindAncestor> mode can be defined inline, with the two extra arguments for ancestor type and level that the other modes do not require.
trans-unit.target: 標記延伸的主要用途是允許以屬性形式的變數引數建構函式語法以便<xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.FindAncestor>模式可以是內嵌的定義，使用兩個額外的引數上階類型和其他模式不需要的層級。

trans-unit.source: Gets a static value that is used to return a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource" /> constructed for the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.Self" /> mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得靜態值，作用是傳回針對 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource" /> 模式建構的 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.Self" />。

trans-unit.source: A static <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource" />.
trans-unit.target: 靜態 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource" />。

trans-unit.source: Three of the four <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode> values, <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.PreviousData>, <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.Self>, or <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.TemplatedParent>, can produce a <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource> that is wholly static, containing no unique private values.
trans-unit.target: 四個中的三種<xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode>值<xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.PreviousData>， <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.Self>，或<xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.TemplatedParent>，可能會產生<xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource>，是全部靜態的其中包含沒有唯一的私用值。

trans-unit.source: All uses of the static property can share the same object, eliminating the need to allocate separate objects for each use.
trans-unit.target: 使用靜態屬性的所有可共用相同的物件，因而不須每次使用配置個別物件。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, using the static property reduces memory usage.
trans-unit.target: 因此，使用靜態屬性，可降低記憶體使用量。

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 文字用法

trans-unit.source: For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/relativesource-markupextension.md).
trans-unit.target: 如[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]的詳細資訊，請參閱[RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/relativesource-markupextension.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a style trigger that creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> that reports a validation error message.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範建立樣式觸發程序<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>，報告驗證錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The value of the setter binds to the error content of the current <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> (the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> using the style) using the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.RelativeSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Setter 的值會繫結至目前的錯誤內容<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>(<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>使用樣式) 使用<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.RelativeSource%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Implement Binding Validation](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-binding-validation.md) for more information on this example.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[How to： 實作繫結驗證](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-implement-binding-validation.md)如需有關這個範例。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorLevel" /> property should be persisted.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否應該保存 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorLevel" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the property value has changed from its default; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性值已經從其預設值變更，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This `ShouldSerialize` method is provided because the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorLevel%2A> property does not have a simple default value.
trans-unit.target: 這`ShouldSerialize`方法提供，因為<xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorLevel%2A>屬性並沒有簡單的預設值。

trans-unit.source: This method indicates whether the property has changed from its default value.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會指出屬性是否已變更其預設值。

trans-unit.source: You typically invoke this method if you are either developing a designer for the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource> or developing your own control incorporating the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您開發的設計工具通常呼叫這個方法<xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource>或開發您自己的控制項加入<xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource>。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorType" /> property should be persisted.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否應該保存 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorType" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the property value has changed from its default; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性值已經從其預設值變更，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This `ShouldSerialize` method is provided because the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorType%2A> property does not have a simple default value.
trans-unit.target: 這`ShouldSerialize`方法提供，因為<xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource.AncestorType%2A>屬性並沒有簡單的預設值。

trans-unit.source: This method indicates whether the property has changed from its default value.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會指出屬性是否已變更其預設值。

trans-unit.source: You typically invoke this method if you are either developing a designer for the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource> or developing your own control incorporating the <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您開發的設計工具通常呼叫這個方法<xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource>或開發您自己的控制項加入<xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Defining Default Values with the ShouldSerialize and Reset Methods](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/defining-default-values-with-the-shouldserialize-and-reset-methods.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[定義預設值使用 ShouldSerialize 和重設方法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/defining-default-values-with-the-shouldserialize-and-reset-methods.md)。

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員支援 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基礎結構，但是您不可以從程式碼直接使用它。

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員支援 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基礎結構，但是您不可以從程式碼直接使用它。

trans-unit.source: Gets a static value that is used to return a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource" /> constructed for the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.TemplatedParent" /> mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得靜態值，作用是傳回針對 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource" /> 模式建構的 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.TemplatedParent" />。

trans-unit.source: A static <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource" />.
trans-unit.target: 靜態 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource" />。

trans-unit.source: Three of the four <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode> values, <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.PreviousData>, <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.Self>, or <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.TemplatedParent>, can produce a <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource> that is wholly static, containing no unique private values.
trans-unit.target: 四個中的三種<xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode>值<xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.PreviousData>， <xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.Self>，或<xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSourceMode.TemplatedParent>，可能會產生<xref:System.Windows.Data.RelativeSource>，是全部靜態的其中包含沒有唯一的私用值。

trans-unit.source: All uses of the static property can share the same object, eliminating the need to allocate separate objects for each use.
trans-unit.target: 使用靜態屬性的所有可共用相同的物件，因而不須每次使用配置個別物件。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, using the static property reduces memory usage.
trans-unit.target: 因此，使用靜態屬性，可降低記憶體使用量。

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 文字用法

trans-unit.source: For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/relativesource-markupextension.md).
trans-unit.target: 如[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]的詳細資訊，請參閱[RelativeSource MarkupExtension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/relativesource-markupextension.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the <xref:System.Windows.Style> definition of a custom control called `NumericUpDown`.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例所示<xref:System.Windows.Style>定義的自訂控制項稱為`NumericUpDown`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock.Text%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> is bound to the `Value` of the object that is the `TemplatedParent`, which is the `NumericUpDown` control that this <xref:System.Windows.Style> is applied to in this case.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock.Text%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>繫結至`Value`相關物件`TemplatedParent`，也就是`NumericUpDown`控制這個<xref:System.Windows.Style>在此情況下套用至。

trans-unit.source: For the complete sample, see [NumericUpDown Custom Control with Theme and UI Automation Support Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160025).
trans-unit.target: 如需完整範例，請參閱[NumericUpDown 自訂控制項搭配主題和 UI 自動化支援範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160025)。
